captions.000: The first of the many big sheds on this terrain, this particular one is completely made of wood.
captions.010: This is the beautiful thing about abandoned buildings, it says: "Laten staan a.u.b., Jan". This means: please keep this here, still being there many years after abandonement.
captions.002: Look-through in one of the sheds
captions.003: An office in a shed and a sign reffering to the "Salle d'exposition" (Showroom). These days it is a place to dump your old vehicle-tyres so the local youth can lit fire to it.
captions.004: The huge wood business even had its own garage en gasoline pump
captions.007: This is the "Salle d'exposition". The shop where you can still see last years wooden floor collection.
captions.008: The toilet is equipped with a truely enormous window. Behind the window there is a wall.
captions.009: Beautiful graffiti art of the "Clan Anti Flic"... The top floor of the house is burned and the stairs don't look that inviting.
